alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, Pasco and Hernando Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Crystal River Airport to 13 miles west of Holiday. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Brooksville, Inverness, Homosassa Springs, Hudson, Beverly Hills, Holiday, Lutz, Weeki Wachee, New Port Richey East, Inverness Airport, South Brooksville, Black Diamond, North Brooksville, Land O Lakes, Hernando County Airport, Timber Pines, Hill n Dale, and Crystal River Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco
